short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Red and blue themes with characters on one side, enemies on the other.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dive into the eerie world of Stranger Things, where red and blue intertwine, depicting the boundary between the real world and the Upside Down. On one side, the brave characters fight for survival, while on the other, terrifying enemies lurk.

🎨 Atmospheric Design: A striking red and blue theme reflecting the supernatural and dangerous forces at play. Characters and enemies are separated, creating a vivid contrast that immerses you in the show’s universe.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay in sync with time as you navigate through the dark, mysterious world of Hawkins.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Quickly access your favorite sites while staying on edge with the intense atmosphere of Stranger Things.
🎮 Play Games: Explore browser-based games related to Stranger Things, adding extra excitement to your browsing experience.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
🚀 More Extension: Unlock additional features inspired by the Stranger Things universe to enrich your browsing experience.
